name: fetch_discord_mcp_documentation
description: Fetch entire documentation file from GitHub repository: SaseQ/discord-mcp. Useful for general questions. Always call this tool first if asked about SaseQ/discord-mcp.

name: search_discord_mcp_documentation
description: Semantically search within the fetched documentation from GitHub repository: SaseQ/discord-mcp. Useful for specific queries.

name: search_discord_mcp_code
description: Search for code within the GitHub repository: "SaseQ/discord-mcp" using the GitHub Search API (exact match). Returns matching files for you to query further if relevant.

name: fetch_generic_url_content
description: Generic tool to fetch content from any absolute URL, respecting robots.txt rules. Use this to retrieve referenced urls (absolute urls) that were mentioned in previously fetched documentation.
